alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 12:28AM MDT until June 22 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PUEBLO COUNTY... At 1228 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Pueblo Depot, or 18 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northern Pueblo and Pueblo Depot. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
